title: DeliveryEvent
description: An event involving the delivery of an item.

allOf.description: An event happening at a certain time and location, such as a concert, lecture, or festival. Ticketing information may be added via the offers property. Repeated events may be structured as separate Event objects.

hasDeliveryMethod.description: Method used for delivery or shipping.

availableThrough.description: After this date, the item will no longer be available for pickup.

availableFrom.description: When the item is available for pickup from the store, locker, etc.

accessCode.description: Password, PIN, or access code needed for delivery (e.g. from a locker).
